entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
